# Exercise 1.1
```{r}
gapminder %>%
  filter(country == "Canada" | 
         country == "New Zealand" | 
         country == "United States") %>%
  filter(year >= "1970" &
           year <= "1979")
```

#Exercise 1.2
```{r}
gapminder %>%
  filter(country == "Canada" | 
         country == "New Zealand" | 
         country == "United States") %>%
  filter(year >= "1970" &
           year <= "1979") %>%
  select(country, gdpPercap)
```
